name: Damsel
description: All Minions know you are in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.
first_night_desc: Wake all the Minions, show them the 'This character selected you' card and the Damsel token.
other_night_desc: If selected by the Huntsman, wake the Damsel, show 'You are' card and a not-in-play Townsfolk token.
